text: "Spotlight" is a song by American rapper Gucci Mane. It was the second single from his album The State vs. Radric Davis (2009). The song features Usher. It was released on October 19, 2009. It was produced by Polow Da Don. == Charts == Chart (2009) Peak Position German Black Chart 16 UK Singles (The Official Charts Company) 46 UK R&B; (The Official Charts Company) 16 US Billboard Hot 100 42 US Hot R&B;/Hip- Hop Songs (Billboard) 15 US Rap Songs (Billboard) 8 == References == == Other websites == *http://showhype.com/music/gucci_mane/ *http://www.mediafire.com/?nwygzyny2di Category:2009 songs Category:Rap songs Category:Usher songs
title: Spotlight (Gucci Mane song)
